readable.content: A boy wearing a red shirt jumps off the blue slide . A little boy in a red t-shirt jumps off of a blue slide at a playground . A young boy wearing a red shirt is jumping off of a blue slide at a park . The blonde boy is wearing a red shirt and jumping off of a blue slide . There is a kid jumping off a blue slide .
